channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Will BYD Electric City Car Lead Europe’s EV Embrace?
item.description: The little BYD Dolphin Surf city car could lead the way to a mass market for electric vehicles in Europe because it won’t need subsidies or government...

item.title: IFA 2025: Roborock Steps Outdoors With Its First-Ever Lawnmower Lineup
item.description: Lawnmowers are niche, with clunky designs and inconsistent navigation. Roborock is betting its expertise in mapping, obstacle avoidance and automation...

item.title: Waymo Is A Trillion-Dollar Opportunity. Google Just Needs To Seize It.
item.description: The self-driving tech unit is expanding but if Alphabet pushed harder, Waymo could dominate a new market with the potential to generate more revenue t...

item.title: Qrevo Curv 2 Pro Headlines Roborock’s Big Vacuum Refresh At IFA 2025
item.description: At IFA 2025, Roborock annouces the Qrevo Curv 2 Pro, F25 Ultra, and H60 Series to highlight high-suction, AI-driven, and smart home vacuum solutions.

item.title: Northern Lights Forecast: 11 States May See Aurora On Friday
item.description: The Northern Lights may be visible in U.S. states this Friday after space weather experts at NOAA forecast a minor geomagnetic storm.

item.title: Bringing goodwill to the conversation
